metadata.title: DJI Osmo Part 53 Intelligent Battery
description: Designed specifically for the Osmo handheld gimbal system, the LiPo Osmo Intelligent Battery from DJI has a 980mAh capacity and features intelligent battery-saving features. Please note: only recharge using the Osmo Intelligent Battery Charger, sold separately980mAh CapacityCompatible with Osmo Handheld Gimbal
